column4: is there a way to globally disable the pc speaker, short of ripping it from the computer case?
are you sure it's not the archive itself?
well, using tar alone doesn't give any errors
if you want a forever fix: unplug it from your motherboard.
i was asking how to do it without physically going into the case
I think that gets reset on every boot though, right?
just put it in your rc.local file
there is one in /etc and one in /etc/init.d
do i need to call sudo in this script, or will it already be running as root?
you are the best.  i've finally been rid of the scourge.
